method: 1. Chop the tomatoes, jalapeno peppers, and red onion into small pieces.
2. In a bowl, combine the chopped tomatoes, jalapeno peppers, red onion, lime juice, fresh cilantro, salt, and black pepper.
3. Mix well and let the salsa sit for at least 15 minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.
4. Serve with your favorite tortilla chips and enjoy!
